hero.subtitle: Sydney-based full-stack software engineer passionate about building efficient and scalable applications.

aboutMe.title: Turning a Passion for Business Optimization into Software Solutions: My Journey into Software Engineering
aboutMe.subtitle: My journey started in demand supply planning and inventory control, where I loved finding ways to improve business processes and solve problems. I used Excel VBA to automate tasks, which made me realize the power of technology in making work more efficient. This sparked my interest in software development. I wanted to do more than just use Excelâ€”I wanted to build tools and applications that could make a bigger impact. So, I pursued a Master's degree in Information Technology, focusing on software development. Now, I'm excited to use my skills to create software that helps businesses run more smoothly and effectively.

experiences.title: Master of IT (Software Development)
descriptions: Built strong software development skills through hands-on projects, covering everything from high-level business strategy and IT alignment to detailed technical implementation. Gained expertise in cloud computing, enterprise systems, databases, and full-stack application development. This holistic approach equips me to deliver scalable, efficient solutions that align with business goals and solve complex technical challenges.
2023 & 2024 Dean's List - Faculty of Engineering and Information Technology

experiences.title: Library IT Officer
descriptions: Emerged as the primary point of contact for IT assistance, resolving customer issues and managing support tickets
Managed patron database using DBeaver and Postman, overcoming data integration challenges and ensuring uninterrupted access to library resources and account systems
Transformed ticket trend analysis process by developing Excel VBA scripts that automated the compilation of statistical data
Strengthened cybersecurity measures by conducting access log analysis to prevent resource misuse

experiences.title: Demand Supply Planner
descriptions: Engineered a material forecasting system leveraging Excel VBA, improving accuracy and readiness in project planning
Enhanced inventory management by analyzing factory data, increasing operational efficiency and reducing overhead
Facilitated cross-functional meetings, enhancing collaboration between stakeholders and ensuring project alignment

experiences.title: Software Engineer
descriptions: Performed analytical research to identify operational inefficiencies in the manufacturing industry
Developed a software prototype using Delphi for inventory management, providing a practical solution to identified operational challenges
Awarded the Outstanding Performance Prize for superior problem-solving abilities among peers

projects.title: Portfolio Website
projects.description: Dynamic and responsive portfolio website built with Angular, enhanced by Tailwind CSS and Daisy UI for a modern, clean design. Interactive animations are powered by GSAP, creating a visually engaging experience. The backend is built with ASP.NET Web API, handling emails upon contact form submissions.

projects.title: Virtual Car Studio
projects.description: Virtual Car Studio allows user to manipulate lighting set-up and camera movement to create sequences of videoes of 3D car model. It similuates the real-life effect of lightings and camera movement for prompt creation of mockup or storyboard in car commercial.
